findings.title: Owner privileges (In the period when the owner is not renounced)
findings.description: The contract owner has excessive privileges to perform various actions such as enabling/disabling taxes, trading, transfer delay, and more.

findings.title: Modifiers: onlyOwner
findings.description: The modifiers onlyOwner are used extensively throughout the contract, giving the owner a high level of control over various functions.

findings.title: Unprotected functions
findings.description: The owner has excessive privileges to modify critical contract settings and perform sensitive operations without proper access control.
